name: Events
description: This section contains documentation for all available events in JsMacros. Events allow you to respond to various game actions and state changes.
overview:
Events are categorized into several groups such as Player Events, World Events, Inventory Events, Status Effects, Network Events, and System Events. All events inherit common properties and methods.

### Event Usage
Events are registered using `JsMacros.on`. Handlers can filter events based on properties or cancel cancellable events.

methods.name: cancel
toString
methods.description: Get a string representation of the event.
